page.title: 07Local Government in Twyford
page.content: Our block contains 3 villages or hamlets.Twyford has a Parish Council of 7 members plus a Clerk.Pounden has a Parish Meeting when necessary, Godington has neither. Twyford Parish Council are responsible for the following:allotments,street lighting, church clock,recreation ground,bus shelter,payment towards church graveyard plus full responsibility for graveyard extension,provision of rubbish skip several times a year. They receive copies of planning applications in the parish-they may make written comment.They deal with complaints,if appropriate pass them on as follows:a)matters off the road,council housing,planning to Aylesbury Vale District Council. b)Roads, education,health to Bucks County Council.Twyford has funds raised on the General Rate.
